subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Dan Wheldon, who died Sunday at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, was a star in IndyCar Racing who drew little attention in his native Britain.
snippet: Dan Wheldon, who died Sunday at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, was a star in IndyCar Racing who drew little attention in his native Britain.
